item.description:
Our purpose: It's a Wine Tasting and buying opportunity with Lynn and TheTraveling Vineyard! Most wines are rated 90 and above and cost between $10-$20. Wines are available by filling out an Interest to Order form which will later be confirmed by TTV. TTV only accepts credit cards and checks.

Our method: Wine Tastings members who might be interested in purchasing boutique wines are invited to a private wine tasting by Traveling Vineyards. This will take place at 6:00...

There is no charge for admission. Guests are asked to bring a food item that will pair well with wines such as cheese, crackers, strawberries, chocolate, appetizers, sparkling water etc. Please indicate with your RSVP what you will be bringing.

RSVP Limit:
Only 19 members (including guests) could RSVP 'Yes' for this event.
Participants must be 21 and older ( ID required)
If you RSVP and are unable to attend, we ask if possible that you give at least 24 hours notice.

Location: 61 Dannys Way, Wallingford Ct ( home of Patti Bauer)

If interested in booking a private tasting in your home for your guests, please contact me .

Looking forward to meeting you!

Cheers!

Lynn
item.how_to_find_us: This event will take place at a private home in Wallingford. Address and phone will be provided to members that have RSVP'd prior to the event.
item.why: You will have the opportunity to sample and learn about five different fabulous wines from boutique vineyards around the world !

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: The Traveling Vineyard in home wine tasting event, February gathering
